attributes.action: Sack Staff From Haringey Council and get the sentence increased for the Killers of Child P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am unhappy that staff at Harringey Council have managed to get away with failing a child without punishment, surely this is gross negligence?
The fact that the three accused are not going to be charged with murder and will only get probably 14 years is a failing of our justice system, I am disgusted with the outcome of this situation and have created this petition to get public support to get Justice for child P.

Regards

Wayne Fenton

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
